pages.text: Bafometyrs are the androgynous, flaming minions of the Great Goat Baphomet. As a Lesser Demon, Bafometyrs may be found wandering the burning void of the Nether, or lurking in fortresses formed of brimstone.

Bafometyrs are hostile to those not sworn to their master, and can burn enemies to carbonised remains with their soul-fueled pyromancy. However, to those wearing the Besmirched Robes they are neutral, and to initiates of their master, Bafometyrs can even be traded with. Bafometyrs are known to have constant skirmishes with Cleavers, as they battle over control of their ancient fortresses
